column4: No matter what I have tried,I cannot get Eclipse to install plugins in 9.10
I cannot get is no precise description. Please cite an error message so that people can help you more efficiently.

after installing Sun's JDK, I install Eclipse from either the shell or synpatic. Then I try to install OcaIDE, a plug in for Eclipse. After restarting Eclipse, though it says ocaIDE is installed, there is no sign of it

You have now described your problem well enough. I do not know the answer to your problem. Please put the same question here again in this channel directed to the public at large. Someone more knowledgeable than me should answer.
